TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
Well, it could go a looong way..

I almost received a heart attack getting my first reputation point. I was a newbie back then. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I just gave a few people their first rep points. It's great to see what the new members have to offer. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I find myself giving out the first rep point fairly frequently for users signing up to raise support requests on my mods.

If it made me laugh, rep.

If it made me think, rep.

If it made me go "I should steal that," rep\*2.
Five more rep points till my next bar!
After i got my green light, all my rep has stopped....

6 points away.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-13T23:42:52Z" title="04/13/2015 11:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 13, 2015</time> by LABHOUSE**

89 as of now.

Let's push to FOUR!!!!

(I got like 25 points from a single Game Theory reference...)
only 14 more tillI become a trainee engineer!

> 
> (I got like 25 points from a single Game Theory reference...)

You've got to be kidding!

I didn't get a single point for mangling two stanzas of Lewis Carroll!

I'll rep you just for your new avatar.

Hoping you'll find something worthy to rep me for.

Happy landings!

> 
> You've got to be kidding!
> I didn't get a single point for mangling two stanzas of Lewis Carroll!
> 
> I'll rep you just for your new avatar.
> 
> Hoping you'll find something worthy to rep me for.
> 
> Happy landings!

Not one bit. That was insane...

Thanks for the rep. Your Avatar is pretty cool, too... What is it?

Way back in the '70's I used to play arcade video games. There was one called Starhawk that I thought was pretty cool at the time. Black and white vector graphics.

I've used that as a gaming name for a long time.

My avatar is an image taken from that game.

Oh, yeah. I need 24 to get to the next level I think.

Happy landings!
I have 133 points, so I think I need 67 more. I don't remember getting that many points...

> 
> only 14 more till I become a trainee engineer!

So, still 14 points to go. Do three more people wanna give rep? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I still have a hundred to go.

> 
> So, still 14 points to go. Do three more people wanna give rep? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![PR032AJ.jpg](http://static.welco.co.uk/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/PR032AJ.jpg)

> 
> So, still 14 points to go. Do three more people wanna give rep? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Still 159 points to go. Do 32 people want to give me rep ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

I'm at 265 rep points... whatever that means. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(I think it means I'm halfway to the Light-Green group!)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-16T18:19:34Z" title="04/16/2015 06:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 16, 2015</time> by Slam\_Jones**

126 away from my next bar, which will push me into the Light Green Group. It still feels forever away since it's like a third of what I have currently, meaning it will take me like 8 months to get those last remaining points, but only about 25 people.

> 
> 126 away from my next bar, which will push me into the Light Green Group. It still feels forever away since it's like a third of what I have currently, meaning it will take me like 8 months to get those last remaining points, but only about 25 people.

You next rank is at 400 points, so only 125 to go!

> 
> You next rank is at 400 points, so only 125 to go!

I'm pretty sure my next rank is 500, which is 125 away now. One of these days I'll make it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Username has assisted many engineers in trouble (250 reputation points)
> 
> Username is a master kerbal engineer (500 reputation points)

> 
> [http://static.welco.co.uk/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/PR032AJ.jpg](http://static.welco.co.uk/media/catalog/product/cache/1/image/5e06319eda06f020e43594a9c230972d/PR032AJ.jpg)

Wait, where'd it say that? ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

> 
> Still 159 points to go. Do 32 people want to give me rep ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

YES! \*gives rep\*
Sitting safely 24 points away from a bar to extinguish the loneliness of the first.

60 points away from a third bar..

I think now would be the best time to start showcasing my creations.

> 
> I think now would be the best time to start showcasing my creations.

Please do! Better late than never!

Edit: 18 points away from my fourth bar..
